Hi Gregory, 
Thank you for your question! In addition to the great resources that Pam has provided here are a few more examples of local governments that have evaluated their current 311 system.
Savannah, GA
icma.org/Documents/Document/Document/301299
Philadelphia, PA 
http://icma.org/en/Article/101778/City_of_Philadelphia_Selects_ICMA_to_Assist_Philly311
Here are a list of performance measures that local governments can use for customer service including how they evaluate their 311 customer service systems. http://icma.org/en/results/sustainable_communities/resources/blogpost/1955/Performance_measures_for_local_government_customer_service
I hope you find these resources useful. 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern
rsaywitz@icma.org
